page.title: 03The Frisby Clowns.
page.content: Geoff Harris and Gayna Johnson are two clowns who live in a house called "Sea View".Geoff has been a clown for five years.His best tricks are fire eating and diving through a hoop of fire.After leaving school Geoff did a course in London for a fortnight,then he went to college in Winchester,where he got his drama teaching qualifications so he now teaches drama in Loughborough.He has written three plays."Mother Goose"," Merry Christmas Jake" and" Who fears to die?"and has written lots more for use by his drama group.Gayna has been a clown for nearly 3 years.She can do fire tricks but when she and Geoff do their act Geoff does them because he is better.Gayna only likes doing things in front of an audience dressed up as a character.She teaches cookery to children aged 11-16 in Coventry.
